entry.div:
Couleur
for
gold
or mixture
Verdigris
&
sal ammoniac
,
as much of one as the other
, &
as much as a
bean
of
saltpeter
. For if you put a quantity in it, it would make it all boil so much that it would boil over.
Saltpeter
is only put in to make it boil, in order that one recognizes when the substance has boiled enough.

div.ab:
This
couleur
, put on
brittle melted gold
, renders it soft immediately.
